ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We thank N. Bouzid, A. Cannistra, S. Graham, J. HilleRisLambers, R. Huey, and anonymous reviewers for constructive input; T. Root for an introduction to metabolic constraints; and those who collected, compiled, and disseminated the data we used. We thank A. McKechnie for suggestions on assessing data quality. This work was supported by the National Science Foundation [DBI‐1349865 to L.B.B. and OIA‐1632810 to D.L.S.].
